metadata.title: CVE-2022-28368 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Dompdf 1.2.1 allows remote code execution via a .php file in the src:urlfield of an @font-face Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) statement (within anHTML input file).

criterions.comment: php-dompdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
